mType.description: IQMESH Network management - Smart Connect request.

msgId.description: Message identification for binding request with response.

repeat.description: Number of repetitions of DPA messages.

deviceAddr.description: Address to bond the device to.

bondingTestRetries.description: Maximum number of FRCs used to test whether the Node was successfully bonded. If value is 0, then no test is performed and the command always succeeds.

smartConnectCode.description: Smart connect code of the device.

userData.description: Optional data passed to the bonded node.

returnVerbose.description: Flag that includes additional parameters in the response.
